note:
Father of 3, trade unionist, vegetarian, bad mountain biker.
When I was younger all I wanted to do was save the World and enjoy myself. I was unsuccessful in the former and had about a 50% success rate in the latter.
My life trajectory included many years in the service industry peppered with political activism, aid work, study, singing in a punk band, and writing various things in various forms.
Then, despite being a qualified historian I managed to get a career as a healthcare regulator.
